column5: Booked again this year with Welcome Lodge (Just down the road from Lakair) the Family and I will be there the Week of June 16th.. We found them and thier lodge due to TJ's lodge directory  (Insert's a Plug http://www.ontariofishing.net/linkspages/Fishing_Lodges/ ) this will be our forth year returning. I dont know if Gary and Angela read the site but we'll see you soon....With an additional Little one in tow... (Sister In-Laws)  Gerritt.  now to book another week up @ Ivanhoe PP
LOL.. thanks Gerritt... I appreciate it!!
